data.text: Early one day on a dimly lit morning…
data.processed: <story>Early one day on a dimly lit morning…

data.text: Marvelousness starts now☆★☆★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Marvelousness starts now☆★☆★

data.text:
Marve-chin?! If you're around here, say "Marvelous!". 
Jeez, where could she have gone? Ooh!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Marve-chin?! If you're around here, say "Marvelous!". 
<story>Jeez, where could she have gone? Ooh!

data.text:
Brian-san! You're supposed to be looking for 
Marve-chin too! She's been missing since 
morning! Are you not worried about her?
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Brian-san! You're supposed to be looking for 
<story>Marve-chin too! She's been missing since 
<story>morning! Are you not worried about her?

data.text:
Not particularly. She's probably just busy right 
now. And quit yelling at me. I don't want people 
to associate me with you.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Not particularly. She's probably just busy right 
<story>now. And quit yelling at me. I don't want people 
<story>to associate me with you.

data.text:
But Marve-chin is super super curious! What if 
she managed to get to space or something…?! 
Waah! Marve-chin!!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>But Marve-chin is super super curious! What if 
<story>she managed to get to space or something…?! 
<story>Waah! Marve-chin!!

data.text: I'm tired of this. I'm going home.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>I'm tired of this. I'm going home.

data.text:
Hmm? Are those cherry blossom petals? 
Isn't it way too early for that?
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Hmm? Are those cherry blossom petals? 
<story>Isn't it way too early for that?

data.text: Hehe… Ahaha! Yup, that's perfect!
data.processed: <story>Hehe… Ahaha! Yup, that's perfect!

data.text:
Spinny spinny! Poof! We need more and more! 
Bloom in marvelousness☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Spinny spinny! Poof! We need more and more! 
<story>Bloom in marvelousness☆

data.text: Spinny spinny♪ Poof♪ Hmm? Is that Brian-chan?
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed: <story>Spinny spinny♪ Poof♪ Hmm? Is that Brian-chan?

data.text: I have no idea what you two are doing.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>I have no idea what you two are doing.

data.text:
I had a feeling that marvelousness was 
beginning, but I didn't know where☆ But it turns 
out that Laurel found it first★ Marvelousness 
truly has begun!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>I had a feeling that marvelousness was 
<story>beginning, but I didn't know where☆ But it turns 
<story>out that Laurel found it first★ Marvelousness 
<story>truly has begun!

data.text:
Hehe. I found a cherry blossom tree blooming 
early. Look, it's over there. It seems like 
that's what Marve-chin was looking for too.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Hehe. I found a cherry blossom tree blooming 
<story>early. Look, it's over there. It seems like 
<story>that's what Marve-chin was looking for too.

data.text:
Aah, so the cherry blossoms I saw were 
from here. I guess spring really is coming.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Aah, so the cherry blossoms I saw were 
<story>from here. I guess spring really is coming.

data.text:
Yup, and another form of spring is 
coming too! The spring of Sakura Laurel!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Yup, and another form of spring is 
<story>coming too! The spring of Sakura Laurel!

data.text: Hmm? Your spring, huh?
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>Hmm? Your spring, huh?

data.text:
If the cherry blossoms are beginning to 
bloom, then as a Sakura I have to bloom 
as well. I'll bloom brighter than anyone 
else. Look forward to it, Brian.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>If the cherry blossoms are beginning to 
<story>bloom, then as a Sakura I have to bloom 
<story>as well. I'll bloom brighter than anyone 
<story>else. Look forward to it, Brian.

data.text: Kyaa☆ I feel like something marvelous is gonna happen★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Kyaa☆ I feel like something marvelous is gonna happen★

data.text:
Heeey!! You guys are big meanies! 
Having fun without me…
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Heeey!! You guys are big meanies! 
<story>Having fun without me…

data.text:
More importantly! I'm the one who's 
supposed to be having a marvelous time with Brian!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>More importantly! I'm the one who's 
<story>supposed to be having a marvelous time with Brian!

data.text:
Hehe, well why don't we head back to the 
academy? It's been a while since we've all hung 
out, so why don't we continue this conversation 
on the track? ♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, well why don't we head back to the 
<story>academy? It's been a while since we've all hung 
<story>out, so why don't we continue this conversation 
<story>on the track? ♪

data.text: At the same time.
data.processed: <story>At the same time.

data.text:
Oh ho! What a coincidence… Or should I say 
that this was highly probable? That family 
restaurant is your favorite after all, so 
perhaps it was an inevitability.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Oh ho! What a coincidence… Or should I say 
<story>that this was highly probable? That family 
<story>restaurant is your favorite after all, so 
<story>perhaps it was an inevitability.

data.text:
Come now, don't make that face. We're friends, are we not? 
Why don't we gather around the table and 
eat together harmoniously like we always do?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Come now, don't make that face. We're friends, are we not? 
<story>Why don't we gather around the table and 
<story>eat together harmoniously like we always do?

data.text: Parfait parfait parfaifaifait♪
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed: <story>Parfait parfait parfaifaifait♪

data.text:
Oh ho? The coincidences continue to occur, huh? 
You seem quite pleased, Pocke-kun.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Oh ho? The coincidences continue to occur, huh? 
<story>You seem quite pleased, Pocke-kun.

data.text:
Ooh, if it isn't Tachyon and Cafe! Check this parfait out! 
It's got so many things on it, all topped 
off by cherries. What do you guys think?
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed:
<story>Ooh, if it isn't Tachyon and Cafe! Check this parfait out! 
<story>It's got so many things on it, all topped 
<story>off by cherries. What do you guys think?

data.text: I don't know what to say…
data.name: Manhattan Cafe
data.processed: <story>I don't know what to say…

data.text:
Isn't it perfect?! Parfaits really are the best! 
You two should order one too so we can eat some together♪
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed:
<story>Isn't it perfect?! Parfaits really are the best! 
<story>You two should order one too so we can eat some together♪

data.text: Haa… I was planning on getting coffee here and enjoying my afternoon… but I seem to have been swept up by two annoying individuals…
data.name: Manhattan Cafe
data.processed: Haa… I was planning on getting coffee here and enjoying my afternoon… but I seem to have been swept up by two annoying individuals…

data.text: I don't need to explain why Tachyon-san is a problem, but Pocke-san… aside from her crudeness, she's quite intimidating…
data.name: Manhattan Cafe
data.processed: I don't need to explain why Tachyon-san is a problem, but Pocke-san… aside from her crudeness, she's quite intimidating…

data.text: Aaah!
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed: <story>Aaah!

data.text:
What's with you? Why're you yelling so loudly? 
All I did was take the cherry that you left. 
You were just staring at them, so it's not my fault.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>What's with you? Why're you yelling so loudly? 
<story>All I did was take the cherry that you left. 
<story>You were just staring at them, so it's not my fault.

data.text: I left it for a reason!! That was the best part!!
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed: <story>I left it for a reason!! That was the best part!!

data.text:
Hmph, my apologies. But don't you think you're 
worrying too much over some cherries? They've 
already been turned into fructose inside of my 
body after all.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Hmph, my apologies. But don't you think you're 
<story>worrying too much over some cherries? They've 
<story>already been turned into fructose inside of my 
<story>body after all.

data.text: What do you mean by some cherries?!
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed: <story>What do you mean by some cherries?!

data.text: I'm tired of you. Shut up.
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed: <story>I'm tired of you. Shut up.

data.text:
Ooh, how frightening. Was me taking those 
cherries the trigger for this sudden change?
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Ooh, how frightening. Was me taking those 
<story>cherries the trigger for this sudden change?

data.text:
I'll show you what happens when 
you push my buttons. Meet me outside.
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed:
<story>I'll show you what happens when 
<story>you push my buttons. Meet me outside.

data.text: Haa, I'll just get her a new—
data.name: Manhattan Cafe
data.processed: <story>Haa, I'll just get her a new—

data.text: Alright, that's enough, you two.
data.processed: <story>Alright, that's enough, you two.

data.text: Fuji-san!!
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed: <story>Fuji-san!!

data.text:
Sorry for being late, Pocke. I was busy dealing 
with some issues at the dormitories. Have you 
been waiting long? Sorry if you have.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Sorry for being late, Pocke. I was busy dealing 
<story>with some issues at the dormitories. Have you 
<story>been waiting long? Sorry if you have.

data.text:
Don't worry about it, I get that you're busy! 
Plus, I was just having a nice chat with my two 
classmates! Isn't that right, Tachyon♪ Cafe♪
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed:
<story>Don't worry about it, I get that you're busy! 
<story>Plus, I was just having a nice chat with my two 
<story>classmates! Isn't that right, Tachyon♪ Cafe♪

data.text: Such extreme shifts in personality…
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed: <story>Such extreme shifts in personality…

data.text:
Well, I'm glad to see you're all getting along… 
but this seems hard on Cafe.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Well, I'm glad to see you're all getting along… 
<story>but this seems hard on Cafe.

data.text:
No, not particularly… if those two had gotten violent, I 
would've borrowed my friend's power to take care of them both.
data.name: Manhattan Cafe
data.processed:
<story>No, not particularly… if those two had gotten violent, I 
<story>would've borrowed my friend's power to take care of them both.

data.text: Wait, i-is that… a… gh-ghost?! Uwaaaaah?!
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed: <story>Wait, i-is that… a… gh-ghost?! Uwaaaaah?!

data.text:
Oh ho, that was dangerous. Overwhelming pressure 
that could cause anyone nearby to wither, while 
also having the ability to see the invisible. 
What an intriguing girl.
data.name: Agnes Tachyon
data.processed:
<story>Oh ho, that was dangerous. Overwhelming pressure 
<story>that could cause anyone nearby to wither, while 
<story>also having the ability to see the invisible. 
<story>What an intriguing girl.

data.text:
Hehe, hey now Pocke. You're trying to become the 
strongest, right? To do that, you've got to be 
able to befriend any and everyone.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, hey now Pocke. You're trying to become the 
<story>strongest, right? To do that, you've got to be 
<story>able to befriend any and everyone.

data.text:
You're right! If I try my best, I can even befriend 
a gho— your friend! I'll be relying on you, Cafe!
data.name: Jungle Pocket
data.processed:
<story>You're right! If I try my best, I can even befriend 
<story>a gho— your friend! I'll be relying on you, Cafe!

data.text: Haa…
data.name: Manhattan Cafe
data.processed: <story>Haa…

data.text:
Great! Since you've all been so great, I'll be 
treating you today. Order whatever you'd like.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Great! Since you've all been so great, I'll be 
<story>treating you today. Order whatever you'd like.

data.text:
Once we've finished, let's walk 
home together. Back to Tracen Academy!
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>Once we've finished, let's walk 
<story>home together. Back to Tracen Academy!
